name: The Lost Mage
description:
First game I've made trying to get the hang of Game Maker mostly, definitely not a finished project with constructive feedback I might consider finishing it and adding the Ideas I never really got round to doing. It has a total of 3 levels and you can shoot the chest to get a health potion.

WASD: To move

Space: To shoot direction is towards the mouse

Here is a link to Characters I used in the game: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset

This is the tile set I used for the game: https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-tileset

Source files are also there. For whatever reason you might want them.
